Table of Contents

Name

sdfits - fits standard for Single Dish data

Description

SDFITS is a proposed standard for Single Dish data. It used the BINTABLE convention, where the spectral-data and meta-data are stored in the BINTABLE columns.

There are some dialects for SDFITS: "CIMAFITS" (Arecibo) and "MATRIX" (30m/CLASS), the latter designates the spectrum via a "SPECTRUM" column name, instead of the more common "DATA" column name.

See Also

scanfits(1NEMO) , sdinfo(1NEMO) , fits(5NEMO)
